Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
This is the main class which links all the client's game model classes.
Author:
Riccardo Milici

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(int expectedPlayers, Map<String,Boolean> waitingRoom)
      The class constructor used during the waiting-room state management.
      Parameters:
      expectedPlayers - The game players number.
      waitingRoom - A map containing the players currently logged into the game and waiting for it to start.

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(int statusPlayersNumber, int statusRound, Phase statusPhase, GameControllerState statusSubphase, boolean statusExpert, String statusCurrentPlayer, com.google.gson.JsonArray statusPlayers, com.google.gson.JsonObject statusGameBoard)
      The class constructor used to initialize and update the game model when it's running.
      Parameters:
      statusPlayersNumber - The game players number.
      statusRound - The number of the current round.
      statusPhase - The current game phase.
      statusSubphase - The current game sub-phase.
      statusExpert - A boolean parameter indicating the game difficulty.
      statusCurrentPlayer - The current player.
      statusPlayers - A JsonArray containing the info about the players.
      statusGameBoard - A JsonObject containing the info about the game board.

  • Method Details

    • getWaitingRoom

      public Map<String,Boolean> getWaitingRoom()
      Gets a map containing the players registered into the game and their current connection status.
      Returns:
      A new HashMap containing a copy of the waitingRoom attribute.

    • getRound

      public int getRound()
      Gets the current game round.
      Returns:
      The round attribute.

    • getPlayersNumber

      public int getPlayersNumber()
      Gets the total number of the players in this game.
      Returns:
      The playersNumber attribute.

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Gets a list of the players in this game.
      Returns:
      The players attribute.

    • getPlayerByName

      public Player getPlayerByName(String name)
      Gets the player having the specified username.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player to search.
      Returns:
      The player searched if present, null otherwise.

    • parsePlayers

      private void parsePlayers(com.google.gson.JsonArray players, com.google.gson.JsonObject gameBoard)
      This method instantiates and initializes the players through the info contained into the given JsonArray.
      Parameters:
      players - The JsonArray containing the players info.
      gameBoard - The JsonObject containing the game board info.

    • parseGameBoard

      private void parseGameBoard(com.google.gson.JsonObject gameBoard)
      This method instantiates and initializes the game board through the info contained into the given JsonObject.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - The JsonObject containing the game board info.

    • isExpert

      public boolean isExpert()
      Tells the game difficulty.
      Returns:
      True if this game is expert, false otherwise.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(String currentPlayer, boolean token)
      Sets the current player and activates/deactivates it's input, receiving the communication token.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The username of the current player.
      token - The boolean second associated with the communication token.

    • isEffectActive

      public boolean isEffectActive()
      Tells if a special character's effect is active.
      Returns:
      True if an effect is currently active, false otherwise.
